original_text: and Oholibamah bore Jeush, Jalam and Korah. These were the sons of Esau, who were born to him in Canaan.
korean_text: 오홀리바마는 여우스와 얄람과 고라를 낳았으니 이들은 에서의 아들들이요 가나안 땅에서 그에게 태어난 자들이더라

sentences.original_text: and Oholibamah bore Jeush, Jalam and Korah
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 오홀리바마는 여우스, 야람과 고라를 낳았다

sentences.original_text: These were the sons of Esau
who were born to him in Canaan
